item.title: Emily add a quote by Dave Eggers
item.description: "But everyone disappears, no matter who loves them." -- Dave Eggers

item.title: Emily add a quote by Robert Bloch
item.description: "Despite my ghoulish reputation, I really have the heart of a small boy. I keep it in a jar on my desk." -- Robert Bloch

item.title: Emily add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Emily add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Emily add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Emily add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Outside of a dog, a book is man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Emily add a quote by Elie Wiesel
item.description: "The opposite of love is not hate, it's indifference. The opposite of art is not ugliness, it's indifference. The opposite of faith is not heresy, it's indifference. And the opposite of life is not death, it's indifference." -- Elie Wiesel

item.title: Emily add a quote by Fran Lebowitz
item.description: "Think before you speak. Read before you think." -- Fran Lebowitz

item.title: Emily add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Travel is fatal to prejudice, bigotry, and narrow-mindedness, and many of our people need it sorely on these accounts. Broad, wholesome, charitable views of men and things cannot be acquired by vegetating in one little corner of the earth all one's lifetime." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Emily add a quote by Cormac McCarthy
item.description: "I don't know why I started writing. I don't know why anybody does it. Maybe they're bored, or failures at something else." -- Cormac McCarthy

item.title: Emily add a quote by Osip Mandelstam
item.description: "Perhaps my whisper was already born before my lips." -- Osip Mandelstam

item.title: Emily add a quote by Osip Mandelstam
item.description: "A raznochinets needs no memoryâ€”it is enough for him to tell of the books he has read, and his biography is done." -- Osip Mandelstam

item.title: Emily add a quote by Osip Mandelstam
item.description: "Perhaps the whisper was born before lips, And the leaves in treelessness circled and flew, And those, to whom we impart our experience as bliss, Acquire their forms before we do" -- Osip Mandelstam
